title: Why Does My Client Not have an Icon?
body: So around the new client update my icon for the client got lost along the way and I continued to wait for patch after patch hoping to fix the problem but it is still giving me issues. I went into C:\RiotGames\...\LeagueClient.exe and sent to desktop as a shortcut but after I open the client with the shortcut, the client itself is opened as a icon-less application. How do I fix this?

replies.body:
Weeeeiiiiird.....does the client and everything still work normally? 

You should be able to right click on the shortcut, and specify whatever icon you'd like to use as well. Give that a try and you should be able to set it to the League Logo!
Yeah everything works normally. I click on the icon for league but when it opens in the tray its an unmarked program. I would switch it if I could :( . I dont know what to do.
